[{"id":"JT-47146","entityId":"25-1983235","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47146"},{"name":"summary","value":"Change selected group in toolbar when user is scrolling to other links group"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525952376892"},{"name":"updated","value":"1525952376892"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-679","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 66","id":"YouTrack:sprint 66"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47124","entityId":"25-1981527","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47124"},{"name":"summary","value":"Download problem after authorization token timeout"},{"name":"description","value":"

If you leave opened tab with ticket for longer time and you then want to download a file from the ticket, chrome says "download failed" but the file is downloaded with fixed context (example in the attachments). If you do refresh (F5) and download file it is downloaded properly.

It looks the download link doesn't refresh oauth2 token automatically and you need to do it manually with F5.
